input.label: Application
input.populatingSearch: | rest /services/saved/searches | search title=*Gen* is_visible=0 | eval status = if(is_scheduled == "0","Disabled","Enabled") | search status=$status$ AND $tracker$ | table eai:acl.app | sort eai:acl.app

input.label: Tracker Generator
input.populatingSearch: | rest /services/saved/searches | search title=*Gen* is_visible=0 | eval status = if(is_scheduled == "0","Disabled","Enabled") | search status=$status$ AND $application$ | table title | sort title

html.p: This dashboard is used to audit tracker generators. Use the following inputs to filter the results.

ul.li: Select a Status to filter enabled and disabled searches.
Select an Application to filter out the which application context the search resides.
Select a Tracker Gen to filter by tracker generators.
Select to turn Transpose On or Off. Useful for copy/paste into spreadsheet.

html.p:
* - ALL - is default. Make sure to remove it when selecting specific applications or tracker generators
** Input fields will recalculate based on application or tracker generators to only show relevant fields.

table.searchString: | rest /services/saved/searches | search title=*Gen* is_visible=0 | eval status = if(is_scheduled == "0","Disabled","Enabled") | table status title eai:acl.app cron_schedule dispatch.earliest_time dispatch.latest_time next_scheduled_time search | search status=$status$ AND $application$ AND $tracker$ | $transpose$
